sentences: Kas sa oled näinud Eesti kaarti?
context: The Estonian word 'kaart' has multiple meanings depending on context. It can refer to a map (geographical representation), a card in general sense, playing cards for games, plastic bank/credit cards, postcards, or various types of data cards. The most common translations are 'map', 'card', and 'playing card'. Examples include geographical maps (Eesti kaart - Estonia map), payment methods (krediitkaart - credit card), and games (mängukaart - playing card).
